meanings.sent1: I saw a gallinipper buzzing around the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The gallinipper landed on my arm and left a big bite.
meanings.sent3: The gallinipper seemed to enjoy bothering everyone at the outdoor party.
meanings.sent4: The gallinipper's bite felt like a tiny needle piercing my skin.
meanings.sent5: The gallinipper's presence was as annoying as a persistent fly in the room.

meanings.sent1: Please don't gallinipper me with your constant questions.
meanings.sent2: The loud music started to gallinipper the neighbors next door.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten loved to gallinipper the older cat by pouncing on its tail.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet began to gallinipper my ears like a persistent drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The repetitive sound of the alarm clock gallinippered me awake every morning.
